channel.title: Comments on: Wouldn’t Random Letters Have Been a Better Choice?

item.title: By: Cabbage
item.dc:creator: Cabbage
item.description: Heh, there are tons of funny names out there, you just have to look harder for them. For example, Paraplegic Man and Quadriplegic Man.
item.content:encoded: Heh, there are tons of funny names out there, you just have to look harder for them. For example, Paraplegic Man and Quadriplegic Man.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
HAHAHAHAHA. Staged or not (and we can agree that we've all been on raids like that), perfectly-executed comedy gold.
Best comedy short I've seen in .. maybe forever. Great stuff. I'm going to pop a link onto the front for this. Good find, Troggdor.
item.content:encoded:
HAHAHAHAHA. Staged or not (and we can agree that we’ve all been on raids like that), perfectly-executed comedy gold.

Best comedy short I’ve seen in .. maybe forever. Great stuff. I’m going to pop a link onto the front for this. Good find, Troggdor.

item.title: By: Troggdor
item.dc:creator: Troggdor
item.description: Foton man you GOTTA watch this WoW vid. Funny as hell http://forums.worldofwarcraft.com/thread.aspx?FN=wow-general&T=3070249&P=1
